name: Dr. Charles Carroll Smith

immediateFamily.children: Mabel Gertrude Smith (wife of O.H. Culver)

keyDates:
Birthdate: June 11, 1830

Birthplace: Sharon, Connecticut

Died: June 19, 1906 (age 76). Gaysville, Vermont.
about:
A few days after getting married, he joined the Vermont Volunteers during the Civil War and fought at Gettysburg. Was sick with typhoid fever after the war, then went to medical training. Was a country doctor in Vermont.

Carroll Culver was named after him.
